ssot__WebsiteEngagement__dlm.name: Website Engagement
ssot__WebsiteEngagement__dlm.description: The Website Engagement DMO represents data associated with website engagement, such as views or clicks.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to account contact.

ssot__ActionCadenceStepId__c.description: A reference ID to action cadence step.

ssot__BrowserName__c.description: The name of the user’s browser.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to a recorded issue, for example laptop connectivity.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to accounts’ contact point, for example physical address, email address, or phone number.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: A reference ID to country derived from IP address of client.

ssot__CountryRegionId__c.description: A reference ID for the country or region.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date a record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by External Record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceCountryId__c.description: A reference ID to country where device is located.

ssot__DeviceLatitude__c.description: The geo latitude of device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceLocaleId__c.description: A reference ID to user locale configured on device.

ssot__DeviceLongitude__c.description: The geo longitude of device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceOSName__c.description: The name of the device’s operating system.

ssot__DevicePostalCode__c.description: The postal code associated with device.

ssot__DeviceTypeTxt__c.description: A reference ID to type of device.

ssot__DomainName__c.description: The domain name used for the engagement.

ssot__EngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement channel action.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementDateTm__c.description: The date and time of the user’s engagement.

ssot__EngagementEventDirectionId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement event direction, for example, inbound or outbound.

ssot__EngagementNotesTxt__c.description: The details about what transpired during engagement.

ssot__EngagementNbr__c.description: A user-facing ID that isn’t automatically set.

ssot__EngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID to background process that generates volumes of email messages, SMS messages, or other engagement vehicle types.

ssot__EngagementTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement, for example email or phone.

ssot__EngagementVehicleId__c.description: A reference ID to vehicle where engagement was recorded.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to the system’s external record ID.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to contact for account.

ssot__InternalEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement actor that groups the different types of individuals targeted for marketing engagements, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IPAddr__c.description: The IP address of client visiting website.

ssot__IsTestSend__c.description: An indicator if the engagement record was generated as part of testing.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadlId__c.description: A reference ID to person or company that showed interest in products.

ssot__LinkURL__c.description: A link where software application or web page accessed generated engagement.

ssot__MarketAudienceId__c.description: A reference ID to intended audience that engagement was designed to reach.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityId__c.description: A reference ID to step or activity that customer configures in Salesforce Journey Builder tool for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketSegmentId__c.description: A reference ID to group of people who share one or more common characteristics, and are grouped for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketingEmailListId__c.description: A reference ID to the marketing email list.

ssot__PageURL__c.description: The URL of web page that was visited.

ssot__Referrer__c.description: The method that generated user engagement, for example, a campaign or advertisement.

ssot__ReferrerURL__c.description: The URL of application that directed user to software application that generated engagement.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: A reference ID referring to the sales order.

ssot__SentDateTm__c.description: The sent date and time of the engagement.

ssot__SessionId__c.description: A reference ID to the user session.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID to shopping cart for data captured from user actions, for example adding or removing items from shopping cart.

ssot__TargetEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement actor that groups different types of individuals targeted for marketing associated with engagement, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__TaskId__c.description: A reference ID to business activity, for example making a phone call. In the user interface, tasks and event records are collectively referred to as activities.

ssot__WebCookieId__c.description: A reference ID to small piece of data sent from website and stored on user's computer by user's web browser while user is browsing.

ssot__WebSessionId__c.description: A reference ID for the web session.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Website Engagement DMO.

ssot__VisitEndTm__c.description: The date and time when the page was last visited.

ssot__VisitStartTm__c.description: The date and time when the page was first visited.

ssot__WorkflowId__c.description: A reference ID to the sequence of steps or processes from initiation to completion.
